A recursive computation does not necessarily need a base case.
Custom blocks can directly or indirectly call themselves
without any of them including a decision to terminate the recursion.

frontmatter.shortDescription: Recursive computations do not necessarily need a base case
frontmatter.shortCorrection: Recursive computations need a base case to terminate
